title: PTD Today — Media

items.title: Microsoft SQL Server Innovation on AWS | Let's Talk About Data

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this video is a deep dive into Microsoft SQL Server innovations on AWS, focusing on RDS for SQL Server updates announced at re:Invent 2025 and new SQL Server features on EC2. It covers Developer Edition support, M7i/R7i instance support with optimized CPU, expanded storage up to 256 TiB, SQL Server 2025 availability, cost-optimization and tooling improvements, and demos of performance gains on the latest generation instances.
bullets: RDS for SQL Server updates from re:Invent 2025, including Developer Edition support.
Support for M7i and R7i instances with optimized CPU characteristics.
Expanded RDS storage options up to 256 TiB.
Coverage of SQL Server 2025 on AWS EC2 plus new cost, storage, compute and tooling features.
Demonstrations of SQL Server performance gains on the latest generation instances.
takeaways: Developer Edition support can lower Microsoft licensing costs for development and testing environments.
M7i/R7i instance support with optimized CPUs may improve production workload performance.
Up to 256 TiB storage reduces the need for complex database rearchitecture for large datasets.
SQL Server 2025 availability on EC2 and new tooling supports migration, modernisation, and optimisation efforts.
Performance demos highlight potential throughput and efficiency gains from using the latest generation instances.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Daniel Tom, 31, owns and operates Bay Area Sanitation, managing a fleet of almost 2,000 portable toilets serving construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area. The company reported $4.3 million in total income in 2025.
bullets: Owner: Daniel Tom, 31
Company: Bay Area Sanitation — nearly 2,000 portable toilets
Services: Supplies construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area
Financial: $4.3 million total income in 2025
Featured by CNBC Make It
takeaways: Scale matters: a ~2,000-unit fleet demonstrates the operational capability needed for large or multiple-site deployments.
Reliable vendors with recurring revenue models can be strong partners for long-term site support during builds or maintenance.
Regional logistics and rapid response (Bay Area focus) are important when minimizing downtime for time-sensitive projects.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video highlights route planning made easy as Jo discovers the power of Copilot Groups. It presents Copilot Groups within Microsoft Copilot as a capability for simplifying route-planning tasks.
bullets: Description emphasizes that Copilot Groups make route planning easier.
A user named Jo is shown discovering the power of Copilot Groups.
Focus is on a practical, user-centered discovery of the feature.
No transcript is available for the video.
Hashtags used: #copilot, #microsoftcopilot, #ai
takeaways: If route planning is part of your operations, note that the video positions Copilot Groups as a tool to simplify those tasks—consider evaluating the feature for fit.
The content signals Microsoft Copilot is showcasing group-oriented capabilities for operational workflows; assess whether group-based AI assistance aligns with your planning processes.
With no transcript provided, decision-makers should watch the full video/demo to judge applicability and implementation considerations for grid/data center routing needs.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is framed as a present-day, practical set of tools that help auditors handle repetitive tasks, analyse full populations of data, and support decision-making. KPMG directors Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska outline specific technologies (AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara), client benefits, the shift from sampling to full-population analysis, necessary auditor competencies, and implementation challenges including data security and regulation.
bullets: Practical AI tools highlighted: AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI conversational assistants/agents, and KPMG Clara platform.
Shift from traditional sampling to analysis of full populations for deeper, data-driven assurance.
Client-facing features (Clara for Clients) improve communication and real-time management of audits.
Key auditor competencies now include data/AI literacy alongside traditional audit skills.
Implementation challenges emphasised: adaptation, data security, regulatory environment, and potential AI-related risks.
takeaways: Expect more thorough assurance as AI enables full-population analysis rather than sample-based checks.
Plan for stronger data security and regulatory compliance when adopting AI-enabled audit workflows.
Anticipate faster, more transparent audit processes via client platforms and real-time audit management.
Invest in staff upskilling on data analytics and AI tools to maintain audit quality and collaboration.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG where you play the Endministrator across Talos-II, and the trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra Settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield officially launched; it's a 3D real-time strategy RPG set on Talos-II.
Trailer emphasizes NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (MFG).
Captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra Settings using DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Description includes links to the game site and official social channels.
NVIDIA GeForce branding and community links provided (Twitch, Instagram, TikTok, X, Facebook).
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being used in high-resolution content capture — consider evaluating DLSS 4 integration for rendering and capture pipelines.
Trailer capture used an RTX 5080-class GPU at 4K Ultra — plan GPU procurement/testing around similar hardware classes for 4K workflows.
MFG 4X Mode is explicitly referenced — test different MFG modes to validate quality and throughput trade-offs in production environments.
Track adoption of DLSS 4 in commercial titles to assess compatibility and support requirements for content production and validation.
